@graph.caption: Vegan Tacos with Lentil Walnut Meat

@graph.name: Vegan Tacos with Lentil Walnut Meat - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: You should really give these vegan tacos with lentil walnut meat and cashew sour cream a try! The filling is also great in lettuce shells!

@graph.headline: Vegan Tacos with Lentil Walnut Meat
@graph.keywords: healthy tacos,lentil walnut meat,vegan cashew sour cream,vegan sour cream,vegan tacos,vegetarian tacos

@graph.name: Vegan Tacos with Lentil Walnut Meat
@graph.description: This recipe is inspired by Angela Liddon's "Ultimate Green Taco Wraps".

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the lentils according to the instructions. Drain and set aside. In a medium pan, roast the walnuts without oil for about 2 minutes or until they're lightly golden. Put the walnuts and the cooked lentils in a food processor and process until chopped. Make sure to leave some texture!
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the lentils according to the instructions. Drain and set aside. In a medium pan, roast the walnuts without oil for about 2 minutes or until they're lightly golden. Put the walnuts and the cooked lentils in a food processor and process until chopped. Make sure to leave some texture!

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sautée the onions for about 3 minutes. Then add the lentil walnut mixture and stir in the tomato paste. Cook for 2 minutes. Add the diced tomatoes and the spices (paprika powder, cumin, oregano, salt, and pepper).
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sautée the onions for about 3 minutes. Then add the lentil walnut mixture and stir in the tomato paste. Cook for 2 minutes. Add the diced tomatoes and the spices (paprika powder, cumin, oregano, salt, and pepper).

recipeInstructions.text: Make the sour cream: Drain the cashews and put all ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the sour cream: Drain the cashews and put all ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the taco shells with the lentil walnut meat, tomato, avocado, kidney beans, corn, and lettuce and top with sour cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill the taco shells with the lentil walnut meat, tomato, avocado, kidney beans, corn, and lettuce and top with sour cream.
